scripts.pages: mv -v pages/index.html pages/top.html &&  cp -vr pages/* build/ && mv -v pages/top.html pages/index.html
scripts.owner: sudo chcon -R -t httpd_sys_rw_content_t deploy/ && sudo chown -R nginx:nginx deploy/
scripts.all: npm run bk && npm run build && npm run pages && npm run dp && npm run owner
